title: File Writing to UserFiles Folder
name: LGF_FileWrite
description: This function block offers writing data as binary / serialized data stream to a file which is then stored on the PLC's memory card in the folder UserFiles.

input.name: execute
input.description: Rising edge starts file write once

input.name: fileName
input.description: Name of file including path: UserFiles/test.dat

output.name: done
output.description: Commanded functionality has been completed successfully

output.name: busy
output.description: FB is not finished and new output values can be expected

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification

output.name: dataLength
output.description: Data length written to file (serialized length of data)

in/out.name: bufferByteArray
in/out.description: Byte array buffer for read / write from / to file

in/out.name: data
in/out.description: Data set to write into file

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeDiagnostics
user_defined_types.description: Diagnostic structure to store and transfer diagnostic information from blocks trough the interface.

member.name: status
member.description: Status of the Block or error identification when error occurred

member.name: subfunctionStatus
member.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

member.name: stateNumber
member.description: State in the state machine of the block where the error occurred
